translations: n.[机]吊索；吊物机（sling 的复数）
v.用投石器投掷；用吊钩钓上（sling 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: They used slings of rope to lower us from one set of arms to another.
sentences.translation: 他们用几条绳索把我们从一组吊臂降到另外一组吊臂。

sentences.sentence: Italy intend to use the slings and arrows as motivational therapy.
sentences.translation: 意大利打算用吊索和弓箭作为激励疗法。

sentences.sentence: There were two slings, most likely configured in the same manner.
sentences.translation: 事故中攀爬者带了两根扁带，很有可能以相同的方式处理。
